General.Name: AVE Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: AVE Science&Technology CO.,LTD researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and services medical devices, biological reagents, remote medical diagnosis network, computer software, automatic control devices, and medical auxiliary equipment. The company's products include urine formed elements analyzer and related reagents, automatic urine analyzers, multi-function microscopy analyzers, semi-automatic biochemical analyzers, feces analyzers, and vaginal secretions analyzers; and reagents and consumables comprising reagent packs, test strips, urine analyzer cleansers, urine sample collectors, and urine formed elements analyzer's quality control products. It serves customers in Europe, the United States, Asia, Africa, and internationally. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
